<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_sow_on_call.OnCallRotationSow</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>On-Call Rotation SOW API. Customization point for On-Call Rotation SOW logic. Example usage:
var onCallRotationSow = new OnCallRotationSow();</description> <name>OnCallRotationSow</name> <script><![CDATA[var OnCallRotationSow = Class.create(); OnCallRotationSow.prototype = Object.extendsObject(OnCallRotationSowSNC, { type: 'OnCallRotationSow' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-06 11:46:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2f4384b7535630100999ddeeff7b12a3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OnCallRotationSow</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="On Call Scheduling for Service Operations Workspace" source="sn_sow_on_call">7e3c2481539260100c54ddeeff7b127b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="On Call Scheduling for Service Operations Workspace">7e3c2481539260100c54ddeeff7b127b</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f4384b7535630100999ddeeff7b12a3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-06 11:51:34</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
